General.Name: SUPER HI INTERNATIONAL HOLDING LTD. American Depositary Shares
General.Description: Super Hi International Holding Ltd., an investment holding company, operates Haidilao-branded Chinese cuisine restaurants in Asia, North America, Europe, Oceania, and internationally. The company is involved in the food delivery business. It also engages in the sale of hot pot condiment products and food. The company was incorporated in 2022 and is headquartered in Singapore.
General.Address: No. 09-04, 1 Paya Lebar Link, Singapore, Singapore, 408533
